name: World Geography
description: Countries, capitals, and geographic features around the world

cards.front: What is the capital of France?

cards.back: France (12 time zones including overseas territories)

cards.front: What is the deepest point on Earth?
cards.back: Challenger Deep in the Mariana Trench
